HatchetMaxAngleOffset.Description: Max random offset used when Hatchet Throw is not fully charged

HatchetMinAngleOffset.Description: Min random offset used when Hatchet Throw is not fully charged

HatchetMinSpeed.Description: Min Speed is used at lowest throw charge. PS: Montage needs to be changed to play sound at the right time

HatchetMaxSpeed.Description: Max Speed is used at highest throw charge

SkillShotMaxCharge.Description: Upper bound as percent charge of throw interaction

SkillShotMinCharge.Description: Lower bound as percent charge of throw interaction

HatchetFarHitDistance.Description: The minimum distance needed to register as a far hit
